Text: ENJOY Shadow Wolf Mysterious : Cause of the full Moon CE by allsmartgames.

The game is buggy. There are 2 hidden object scenes so far, where 1 item each could not be founded. So, no more progress is possible. I request you to post any fix, if available. Thanks for this nice upload.
yea same here. cant find the objects ,axe and a tweezer. bug....:(
I had the same problem, missing items in the hidden scenes. BUT, thank you for taking the time to upload the game. I enjoy your games and now look for your name. So again, thank you!
